GameDefinition.name: GameDefinition
GameDefinition.description: Represents information about a game that the loyalty program offers to its members.

EndDate.description: The date till which the game can be offered to members.

ExpirationPeriod.description: The number of days or months for which a game is valid for a member to play after the game is assigned to them.

ExpirationPeriodUnit.description: The unit of measure for the ExpirationPeriod field.

IsGameAssignmentRequired.description: Indicates whether members are eligible to play the game only if they are assigned the game (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

StartDate.description: The date from which the game can be offered to members.

TimeoutDuration.description: The duration the game is valid for after a participant starts to play it. The value is specified in seconds.
